channel.title: Weird username error
channel.description:
Helo everytime i want to go on my server with my username the username changes for e.g
when i logg in with the username "orenge juice" it changes as soon as i log in to sumthing like "ge juice" and some times i cant even get on my server depending what username i choose for e.g i used the name "lol" and i got this error. 30000 [code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 30000 at stream.readString(stream.java:208) at client.run(client.java:16733) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client lol disconnected (***********) Exception in thread "Thread-1" java.lang.NullPointerException at MD5.compute(MD5.java:48) at client.passHash(client.java:14809) at client.savegame(client.java:17069) at client.destruct(client.java:7856) at client.run(client.java:16960) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)[/code] Please help much appreciated
Kalvin

item.title: Weird username error
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

And how can i fix it?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 01, 2009, 06:05:58 pm[/size][hr]You tell me what’s wrong about the first 4 letters arnt gettin registerred(Thats obvious) but u dont no how to fix it Dont post if ur gonna be a fool

Read full topic

item.title: Weird username error
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

it seams as if the first 4 characters arent being registered, and you need atleast 5 characters to log in

Read full topic

item.title: Weird username error
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Helo everytime i want to go on my server with my username the username changes for e.g

when i logg in with the username “orenge juice” it changes as soon as i log in to sumthing like “ge juice” and some times i cant even get on my server depending what username i choose for e.g
i used the name “lol” and i got this error.
30000

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 30000 at stream.readString(stream.java:208) at client.run(client.java:16733) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client lol disconnected (***********) Exception in thread "Thread-1" java.lang.NullPointerException at MD5.compute(MD5.java:48) at client.passHash(client.java:14809) at client.savegame(client.java:17069) at client.destruct(client.java:7856) at client.run(client.java:16960) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

Kalvin
